channel.title: ~Noobs Guide On Making Your First RSPS~
channel.description:
[center] ~~Noobs Guide On Making A RSPS~~ ~~Presented By: Programing Forever~~ Now lately people have been trying to make a server, im their to help, i am a certified Java,Visual Basic, And .Net Programer and i would like to share my knowledge with you, There For, I Am Here To Make A Easy Userfriendly Guide On Making A Runescape Private Server, please note we are not useing hamachi, for the fact that hamachi opens ports from your computer to the clients computer leading to un safe matter. Before we start I want you to know i will be providing screen shots, they will have a red outline of where you should click. Let's Get Started, Shall We?
The First Step Is Optional But Is Recomended: Go To No-ip.com, Sign-up If You Alredddy Dont Have One, It should be located to the right of the page, it should say Create Account, Click on that, If you dont want to go through the no-ip process then go to whatismyip.com and you will people will be using that to log in but its more safe to use a DNS
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/hskns9.png[/img]
Second, If you are going with the no-ip process Fill Out the forum and click, 'I Accept, Create My Account' [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/161jd5x.png[/img]
Third, Login with the username and password you signed up with [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/2ypkk8n.png[/img]
Forth, Click On Hosts/Redirects, Where going to be redirecting the DNS to your IP [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/rjdtzt.png[/img]
Fifth, Click on add a host. [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/10hnkfn.png[/img]
Now its time to name your DNS! In The Hostname Put Whatever You Want! BUT REMEMBER: LEAVE THE REST ALONE!!! [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/2wpnkna.png[/img]
After You have Done That It Should Look Like This [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/345ewpl.png[/img]
Now Next Thing We Want To Do Is To PortForward The server, this is one of the most important Parts, this allows people to connect to your server, to do this go to fallow the pictures below, I Have Used A Clasic Based theme to make things easyer. But to get to the windows firewall on... XP, 1. Click Start and then click Control Panel.
2. In the control panel, click Windows Security Center.
3. Click Windows Firewall.
Vista, 1. click the Start button [img]http://windowshelp.microsoft.com/QueryWS/GetOpenContent.aspx?assetID=4f6cbd09-148c-4dd8-b1f2-48f232a2fd33&DocumentSet=en-US&RenderKey=XML[/img] , clicking Control Panel, clicking Security, and then clicking Windows Firewall.
After You Are Their Click On Allow A Program Through Windows Firewall,
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/35i9h6t.png[/img]
You will have better server proformence if you turn windows firewall off but its up to you. Then do as in the picture click ok do for tcp and upd
[img]http://i25.tinypic.com/s1hhya.png[/img]
and your all set and ready to run your server, congradulations! Now if you have a router go to portforward.com and find out how to port forward your router you just need to port forward 43594 on BOUTH, I will make a post though on how to do it.
Now All You Need Is A Server And Client! You Can Check Out These Popular Posts That I Recomend
~Server~ 317- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,360540.0.html 508- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369081.0.html
~Client~ 317 - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,383921.0.html 508 - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364324.0.html [/center]

item.title: ~Noobs Guide On Making Your First RSPS~
item.dc:creator: @ProgramingForever ProgramingForever
item.description:
@ProgramingForever wrote:

[center] Noobs Guide On Making A RSPS
Presented By: Programing Forever
Now lately people have been trying to make a server, im their to help, i am a certified Java,Visual Basic,
And .Net Programer and i would like to share my knowledge with you, There For, I Am Here To Make A
Easy Userfriendly Guide On Making A Runescape Private Server, please note we are not useing hamachi,
for the fact that hamachi opens ports from your computer to the clients computer leading to un safe matter.
Before we start I want you to know i will be providing screen shots, they will have a red outline of where you
should click. Let’s Get Started, Shall We?

The First Step Is Optional But Is Recomended:
Go To No-ip.com, Sign-up If You Alredddy Dont Have One, It should be located to the right of the page,
it should say Create Account, Click on that, If you dont want to go through the no-ip process then
go to whatismyip.com and you will people will be using that to log in but its more safe to use a DNS

hskns9.png169×522

Second, If you are going with the no-ip process Fill Out the forum and click, ‘I Accept, Create My Account’

161jd5x.png684×760

Third, Login with the username and password you signed up with

Forth, Click On Hosts/Redirects, Where going to be redirecting the DNS to your IP

rjdtzt.png885×26

Fifth, Click on add a host.

10hnkfn.png709×256

Now its time to name your DNS! In The Hostname Put Whatever You Want!
BUT REMEMBER: LEAVE THE REST ALONE!!!

2wpnkna.png706×552

After You have Done That It Should Look Like This

345ewpl.png709×354

Now Next Thing We Want To Do Is To PortForward The server, this is
one of the most important Parts, this allows people to connect to your server,
to do this go to fallow the pictures below, I Have Used A Clasic Based theme to make things easyer.
But to get to the windows firewall on…
XP,
1.
Click Start and then click Control Panel.

In the control panel, click Windows Security Center.

Click Windows Firewall.

Vista,
1.
click the Start button , clicking Control Panel, clicking Security, and then clicking Windows Firewall.

After You Are Their Click On Allow A Program Through Windows Firewall,

You will have better server proformence if you turn windows firewall off but its up to you. Then do as in the picture click ok do for tcp and upd

s1hhya.png434×507

and your all set and ready to run your server, congradulations! Now if you have a router go to portforward.com and find out how
to port forward your router you just need to port forward 43594 on BOUTH, I will make a post though on how to do it.

Now All You Need Is A Server And Client!
You Can Check Out These Popular Posts That I Recomend

~Server~
317- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,360540.0.html
508- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,369081.0.html

508 - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364324.0.html
[/center]
